provisions.title: Section 16
provisions.content:
16. Nothing in this Act shall extend to the Urban and
            Suburban Districts of the Corporate Area as defined in
            the Kingston and St. Andrew Corporation Act, or to any
            town or district in which the Parochial Fire Brigade Act
            (now repealed) was in force immediately prior to the com-
            mencement of the Fire Brigade Act.
